title: Help the Devilish Ox
content: Inn. You must get this quest before you enter the city. Find the strange ox in Rivington Requisitioned Barn (X41, Y-143), and use Speak with Animals to talk to it. Insist it tells you what exactly it is will force the Stange Ox to transform into an Lv 9 ooze and fight. (Drop Hat of Fire Acuity, Shapeshifter's Boon Ring, Diamond, and Jade.)
